page.title: 12Lothingland Playground Games
page.content: Some games we play in 1985. RED ROVER. You need 5 or more people in two groups facing each other. You call someone over by singing,"RED ROVER, RED ROVER, WE CALL (name) OVER." The person runs and tries to break through the hands, if they do they can take a person over to their side, if they don't belong to that group. Keep playing until no-one remains in the other group. BRITISH BULLDOG. Choose 1-3 people to stand in the middle of a large area, these people have to try to catch the remaining people, who can only run across the ground when told to do so. When captured you may put up a fight, but when lifted off the ground you must help your captors. The game continues until everyone is caught.
